hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Sarjis: The Prophet (ﷺ) prohibited to urinate in a hole. Qatadah (a narrator) was asked about the reason for the disapproval of urinating in a hole. He replied: It is said that these (holes) are the habitats of the jinn

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الْبَوْلِ، فِي الْجُحْرِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Urinating In Burrows
